name: metal door
look_description: A large, metal door stands foreboding in front of you. Oddly, there isn't even a keyhole in the door. The only opening on the door is some sort of slot. What are you even supposed to put in there? A coin?

touch.text: The door is cold, smooth metal.

read.text: Despite seeing the heavy metal hinges bolted to the wall, you try and fail to pick up the metal door.

break.text: You throw your full body weight into the door but it does not budge. You feel a bit ridiculous for even trying and now your shoulder is aching. You look over your shoulder as if you expect Dr. Peters to be there frowning.
